summary.overview: This JCL job sets up and loads the Transaction Category master file for the CARDDEMO application. It creates a VSAM indexed dataset and populates it with transaction category reference data used for categorizing card transactions.
business_functions: Delete existing Transaction Category VSAM file to ensure clean setup
Create new VSAM indexed cluster for storing transaction category reference data
Load transaction category data from sequential file into VSAM structure for indexed access
Enable concurrent access to transaction category data for multiple users and applications

TRANCATG.jcl.program_overview: IBM Access Method Services utility for VSAM dataset management and data loading operations

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Category Master File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANCATG.VSAM.KSDS)
datasource_summary.function: Master file containing transaction category reference data with 6-byte keys and 60-byte fixed records, supporting shared access for transaction categorization

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Category Data Component (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANCATG.VSAM.KSDS.DATA)
datasource_summary.function: Data component of the transaction category VSAM cluster containing the actual transaction category records

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Category Index Component (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANCATG.VSAM.KSDS.INDEX)
datasource_summary.function: Index component of the transaction category VSAM cluster providing keyed access to transaction category data

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Category Source Data (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANCATG.PS)
datasource_summary.function: Sequential input file containing source transaction category data used to populate the VSAM master file

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    IDCAMS["IBM Access Method Services utility for VSAM dataset management and data loading operations (IDCAMS) "]
